backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Decision – Official Plan Amendment 537, as adopted by By-law 1107-2022 - Keele-St. Clair Secondary Plan Area

contact.contactName: Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing

noticeDescription:
File No.: 20-OP-221476
Municipality: City of Toronto
Subject Lands: Lands within delineated station areas

Date of Decision: August 15, 2025
Date of Notice: August 15, 2025



NOTICE OF DECISION
With respect to an Official Plan Amendment
Subsection 17(34) of the Planning Act


A decision was made on the date noted above to approve, without modification, the City of Toronto’s Official Plan Amendment 537, as adopted by By-law 1107-2022.


Purpose and Effect of the Official Plan
The City of Toronto’s Official Plan Amendment 537, as approved, introduces the Keele-St. Clair Secondary Plan and delineates and plans for a protected major transit station
area within the Secondary Plan Area.

The Official Plan Amendment applies to the Keele-St. Clair Secondary Plan Area, including a protected major transit station area in the City of Toronto.


Decision Final
Pursuant to subsections 17(36.5) and (38.1) of the Planning Act, the decision of the Minister of Municipal Affairs and Housing regarding an Official Plan adopted in accordance with section 26 of the Planning Act is final and not subject to appeal. Accordingly, the City of Toronto Official Plan Amendment 537, as approved, comes into effect on August 15, 2025.

 

Other Related Applications
• Official Plan Amendment 524
• Official Plan Amendment 540
• Official Plan Amendment 544
• Official Plan Amendment 570
• Official Plan Amendment 575


Getting Additional Information
Additional information is available on City of Toronto’s website:
https://www.toronto.ca/city-government/planning-development/official-planguidelines/
official-plan/official-plan-review/

or by contacting the Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing:

Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing
Municipal Services Office – Central
777 Bay Street, 16th Floor
Toronto, Ontario M7A 2J3

 

DECISION
With respect to City of Toronto Official Plan Amendment 537
Subsection 17(34) of the Planning Act


I hereby approve Official Plan Amendment 537 for the City of Toronto, as adopted by the
Council for the City of Toronto by By-law 1107-2022 without modification.
